Description: As a new user I want to register an account So that I can access the platform
Acceptance Criteria:
- Registration form with email password name role
- Email validation
- Password strength check (8-128 chars)
- Age validation (18-65)
- Terms acceptance checkbox
- Email verification link sent
- Success/error messages

Description: As a registered user I want to login So that I can access my account
Acceptance Criteria:
- Login form with email/password
- JWT token generation
- Remember me option
- Forgot password link
- Redirect to dashboard after login
- Error handling for invalid credentials

Description: As a user I want to update my profile So that I can showcase my information
Acceptance Criteria:
- View profile page
- Edit profile form (name bio skills location)
- Save changes button
- Profile visibility settings (public/private)
- Avatar upload
- Skills management (add/remove up to 10)
- Validation for all fields

Description: As a user I want to upload profile picture So that others can recognize me
Acceptance Criteria:
- Upload button
- File type validation (JPG PNG WebP)
- Size limit 10MB
- Image preview before upload
- Crop/resize functionality
- Delete existing avatar
- Default avatar if none uploaded

Description: As a user I want to change my password So that I can keep my account secure
Acceptance Criteria:
- Current password verification
- New password input
- Confirm new password
- Password strength indicator
- Length validation (8-128 chars)
- Success notification
- Logout and re-login required

Description: As a new user I want to verify my email So that my account is activated
Acceptance Criteria:
- Verification email sent on registration
- Click verification link
- Token validation (24hr expiry)
- Account activation
- Resend verification link option
- Already verified handling

Description: As a user I want to manage account settings So that I can customize my experience
Acceptance Criteria:
- Notification preferences
- Privacy settings
- Language selection
- Timezone settings
- Theme selection (light/dark)
- Email preferences
- Save changes button

Description: As a user I want to control profile visibility So that I can manage my privacy
Acceptance Criteria:
- Public/Private toggle
- Show/hide email option
- Show/hide phone option
- Profile searchability setting
- Apply changes instantly

Description: As a freelancer I want to add skills to my profile So that clients can find me
Acceptance Criteria:
- Add skill button
- Skill autocomplete
- Remove skill button
- Maximum 10 skills
- Skill validation
- Display skills on profile
- Search by skills

Description: As a user I want to delete my account So that I can remove my data
Acceptance Criteria:
- Delete account button
- Confirmation modal
- Password verification
- Warning about data loss
- Permanent deletion
- Logout immediately
- Email notification

Description: As a user I want my session to be secure So that my account is protected
Acceptance Criteria:
- JWT access token (30min)
- JWT refresh token (7 days)
- Auto-refresh before expiry
- Logout functionality
- Session timeout handling
- Concurrent session support

Description: As a user who forgot password I want to reset it So that I can regain access
Acceptance Criteria:
- Forgot password link
- Email input form
- Send reset email
- Reset token validation
- New password form
- Password strength check
- Success confirmation

Description: As a user I want to view other users profiles So that I can learn about them
Acceptance Criteria:
- Public profile page
- Display user info (name bio skills)
- Display avatar
- Respect privacy settings
- Profile not found handling
- Responsive design

Description: As a security-conscious user I want 2FA So that my account is extra secure
Acceptance Criteria:
- Enable/disable 2FA toggle
- QR code generation
- TOTP verification
- Backup codes
- Recovery options
- SMS fallback option

Description: As a user I want to login with Google/GitHub So that registration is faster
Acceptance Criteria:
- Google OAuth button
- GitHub OAuth button
- Account linking
- Profile data import
- Email verification skip
- Error handling
- Privacy consent
